title: Revenge Consulting - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Mature   Mystery   Seinen   Supernatural
tags: Calm Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Death   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reincarnation   Ruthless Protagonist   Special Abilities
author: Guardian   글 가디록
description: After his 100th cycle of death and reincarnation, Ryushin decided to stake it all by overthrowing the set rules and killing his way out of the reincarnation school just to live a normal life without the fear of death. He returns to Earth to learn that what everyone wanted was money, power and honor! How will he save himself from the misfortune that was tied to him like destiny?>
